content:
The artillerymen of the separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Roman the Great destroyed the self-propelled howitzer 2C19 "MSTA-C" and the ammunition composition.

Appropriate videoHe outlined March 12Stratum of the Armed Forces.

MSTA-S is a long-range gun that can strike up to 29 kilometers.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat Ukrainian special forces destroyed the Russian beech.
title: Defense forces destroyed a long -range gun and ammunition composition
